name: Spring Breakout
description:
You're under quarantine in your dorm room. Everywhere you look, security guards make sure that no student strays. But, the BIGGEST Spring Break Beach party is on the other side of town. Use what you can find to distract the guards and get to the other side of town without getting caught. But be careful what you pick up. Everything has a price to use. 

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move the player. When you pick up an inventory object, click on the button to see what it can do. You must use your mouse to drop the inventory item and distract the security guards.
